::Prowl/Striker::

Prowl lets out a breath of relief as he sees the attackers retreat, 
turning around to survey the damage to the Ark. He shakes his head. 
Repairing the vessel was useless. It would take forever.

He walks into the Ark, looking around at any internal damage.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Striker steps out of a CR chamber, setting off toward the bridge.
